description: Tender sugar cookies with a delicate crispness and a soft, buttery center, subtly flavored with vanilla and almond.
ingredients: [{"name": "butter", "units": "cup", "amount": 1}, {"name": "confectioners' sugar", "units": "cups", "amount": 1.5}, {"name": "egg", "units": "large", "amount": 1}, {"name": "vanilla extract", "units": "teaspoon", "amount": 0.5}, {"name": "almond extract", "units": "teaspoon", "amount": 0.5}, {"name": "all-purpose flour", "units": "cups", "amount": 2.5}, {"name": "baking soda", "units": "teaspoon", "amount": 1}, {"name": "cream of tartar", "units": "teaspoon", "amount": 1}, {"name": "granulated sugar", "units": "for sprinkling", "amount": null}]
instructions: 1. Cream the butter and confectioners' sugar until smooth and creamy. 2. Beat in the egg, vanilla, and almond extract. 3. In a separate bowl, whisk together flour, baking soda, and cream of tartar. 4. Add dry ingredients to wet mixture and mix until combined. 5. Chill the dough for 2-3 hours. 6. Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). 7. Roll out dough and cut into shapes. 8. Sprinkle with granulated sugar. 9. Bake for 7-8 minutes until edges are lightly golden.
notes: Chill the dough to prevent spreading. Can be decorated with icing or sprinkles.
